recentChanges:
1. Turned on Tab and Arrow keys by default
2. Updated target Android version to latest(Android 10)
3. Added support 64-bit processors(arm64-v8a and x86_64)
4. Added support exporting RSA Keys generated by MobileSSH
comments: No method of loading existing private key, even after paying for upgrade.
works great but the background on the premium version is extreme ugly some options to change the fonts will be nice too
Bought the premium version thinking that I will be able to use existing ssh keys. Boy was I wrong. Do not recommend this app. Waste of money. Wish I had read the reviews first.

Fantastic SSH tool you can use for connecting to remote hosts right from your phone. Simple and useful tool. I can log into my router and administer the firewall and ad blocking apps running from the couch instead of needing to go to the desktop and use a browser interface. Only thing I would ask for is ability to save commands which would automate logging in and issuing command line updates. I have to copy paste or type commands every time I connect.
No support for your own RSA private key

title: Call Control for BroadWorks (xsi)
description:
Call Control for BroadWorks (xsi) allows you to originate, transfer,  merge and hold/resume calls from your Android phone through your BroadSoft BroadWorks powered desk phone and enables easy control of Remote Office, BroadWorks Anywhere, DND and Call Forwarding settings while on the move. If used with an account that is a member of a Call Center, joining/unjoining and control of the Agent ACD State is also possible.

IMPORTANT: Call Control requires service from a BroadWorks powered service provider and the account must include the following services
- BroadWorks Anywhere
- Remote Office
- Simultaneous Ring Personal
- Calling Line ID Delivery Blocking
- Do Not Disturb
- Call Forwarding - Always
- Call Forwarding - No Answer
- Call Forwarding - Not Reachable
- Call Forwarding - Busy
- Basic Call Logs
- Call Center
- Voice Messaging
in order to benefit fully from this app. 


If you have any other question, please do not hesitate to contact support@nomadiccircle.com

title: Naked Browser Pro / NB Pro web browser
description:
I want everyone who purchases this web browser to be happy with it so please try the free version. It will help you become familiar with how this Pro version works: https://play.google.com/store/search?q=naked+browser Free version also available from the free version web site.

PLEASE EMAIL ME
Please email me with any bug reports or comments: androidpro@nakedbrowser.com
Google allows me only 350 characters to respond to Play Store reviews.

PERMISSIONS
This app does not and will never spy or monitor in any way. All permissions are used only for functionality that you want and NEVER for any other purpose. See below for more information about permissions.

WHAT'S NEW AND DIFFERENT IN PRO
See http://nakedbrowser.com/pro/ for help.
‚Ä¢ set white list rules per website for: images, JavaScript, user agent, cookies, geolocation
‚Ä¢ optionally show images only over Wifi
‚Ä¢ tab close method and more gesture options
‚Ä¢ set link long press action to show context menu or open in new background/foreground tab. Open in background tab then swipe to switch to new tab. See browser options text for instructions.
‚Ä¢ make screenshots of web pages
‚Ä¢ bookmarks import from text file makes it easy to transition from the free version
‚Ä¢ keep screen on
‚Ä¢ create home launcher "desktop" shortcuts: long press new tab "+" button
‚Ä¢ NFC sending/receiving
‚Ä¢ UI tweaks: optional tab & URL bar on bottom, expanded/scrollable bottom menu, bottom menu labels removed, app icon label now "Browser NBPro", remembers open/close bookmark folder states
‚Ä¢ too many new features to list and more to come!

CANNOT SEE THE BROWSER MENUS?
If your device has no menu button, you may be able to long press the device app switch button or back button. This Pro version provides additional gesture options to make it easier to show the menus. By default, swipe up from bottom corner, or down from top edge. 5-finger tap screen to shows menus, in case all gestures disabled.

ABOUT PERMISSIONS
No permission will EVER be used by this software to spy or monitor in any way. These permissions will only be used if you enable the functionality in the browser.
‚Ä¢ Internet: ONLY for your web page requests & retrievals. Absolutely no monitoring or snooping, & ad-less too.
‚Ä¢ File read/write: ONLY so you can save & upload files. Absolutely no other reason.
‚Ä¢ GPS: DISABLED BY DEFAULT. ONLY to allow web sites to access your location. Option must be enabled, and even then each site interested in your location will ask your permission.
‚Ä¢ View network & Wifi connections: ONLY to handle changes in network connectivity and allow optionally loading images only on Wifi.
‚Ä¢ Keep device from sleeping: ONLY to prevent downloads from being cut off.
‚Ä¢ Access download manager: ONLY to ensure access to your device's download manager for downloading files.
‚Ä¢ Near field communication (NFC): DISABLED BY DEFAULT. ONLY to send and receive web addresses to and from nearby devices (backs touching) via NFC. Option must be enabled to send, and even then you will be prompted for confirmation.
‚Ä¢ Create shortcuts: ONLY for you to create home launcher shortcuts to sites.

ABOUT THE USER INTERFACE
User interface graphics are a low priority at this time.

Designed and made by an independent software developer named Tony in Redwood City, California, United States of America.

Thanks to you for the help and support.

LEGAL
Uses the list from http://publicsuffix.org/ under the MPL2 license http://www.mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/

recentChanges:
PLEASE READ APP DESCRIPTION

‚Ä¢ over a dozen fixes, optimizations, and tweaks

PREVIOUSLY

‚Ä¢ file download improvements

PLEASE READ APP DESCRIPTION
comments: Just the best. Has dark mode, works with bookmarklets, scrolls with vol buttons & features easy 2 finger zoom. Also very important the flow text function, finally all the text is visible on phone screens... Also to my knowledge the only browser for Android which allows you to use bookmarklets easily... Bravo & thx

I don't even know how long I've been using Naked Browser Pro, but it has to be 6 to 8 years or more. In that time and on several devices, I've had very few problems. It is simply the fastest and most reliable browser I've used, and I have tried many. Not sure why I haven't left a review before, but any time I try a different browser, I come back to NB Pro within a day or two. So... Apparently its the best one.

Awesome browser, one issue. Since some time after the last update the zoom out function when using desktop client doesn't work in portrait mode anymore. Tested on original LG Android 9 OS on LG g7 thinq and on custom rom also based on Android 9 on xiaomi mi 8. It would be really great if this gets updated. Could it be an issue with Google Webview? Since it worked a few months after the last NB update and suddenly stopped working a week ago or so, without updating NB.

Used this since it's inception in 2012... I can't download anything, it will DL but I cannot open the file once DL'ed. I used Bromite, and I had no problems with the same file. Emailed them, no answer...

Okay update again: looks like it's updated and most issues has been corrected good job. But since it released NB never had the ability to share images, you can only share a link, why? Nearly every browser has this feature. Please add this. Thanks.

title: Call Control for BroadWorks
description:
NOTE: This app uses OCI/CAP and is not compatible with R22 - for the XSI based version of Call Control for BroadWorks, please check https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.nomadiccircle.ccbw


Call Control for BroadWorks allows you to originate calls from your Android phone through your BroadSoft BroadWorks powered desk phone and enables easy control of Remote Office, BroadWorks Anywhere, DND and Call Forwarding settings while on the move. If used with an account that is a member of a Call Center, joining/unjoining and control of the Agent ACD State is also possible.

IMPORTANT: Call Control requires service from a BroadWorks powered service provider and the account must include the following services
- BroadWorks Anywhere
- Remote Office
- CommPilot Express
- Simultaneous Ring Personal
- Calling Line ID Delivery Blocking
- Do Not Disturb
- Call Forwarding - Always
- Call Forwarding - No Answer
- Call Forwarding - Not Reachable
- Call Forwarding - Busy
- Basic Call Logs
- Client Call Control*
- Voice Messaging
- Call Recording
in order to benefit fully from this app. 

* Without "Client Call Control" call initiation is not possible.

Note that the default port for OCI/CAP communication is 2208 - or 2209 if SSL is enabled.

Regarding ICS / Ice Cream Sandwich & Jelly Bean:
The app works well on Ice Cream Sandwich (4.0) and Jelly Bean (4.1, 4.2 and 4.2.1)- there are however some manufacturers that are a bit sloppy getting the device profiles updated, resulting in erroneously listing of apps not being compatible. If you have a 4.0/4.1/4.2 based device and the app is listed as incompatible, please contact support for a workaround.

If you have any other question, please do not hesitate to contact support@nomadiccircle.com

It is a little complex, but that is probably because it does so much.
This application works beautifully and does exactly what it should. I had one small problem and the developer took care of it immediately. The best support you can get! Well done!
Works great with Swisscom Business Connect in Switzerland! Would be nice if the UI would be updated to match the Android Holo style though.
This app was recommended by our phone vendor, and it is great.  The author's customer support is quick and extremely helpful. Thank you very much!

title: Smart Control Premium (OBDII)
descriptionHTML:
The first smart on-board computer realized on Android platform, able to connect through diagnostic protocols using a compatible OBD2 ELM327 bluetooth device. Thanks to the information provided by the OBDII diagnostic, Smart Control is able to calculate the consumption, detect the beginning and the end of every move and store trips; in addition, it can calculate and track performance data such as power, torque and speed up or braking etc.

For the latest generation of the Skyactiv Mazda engines, the app is able to display the data related to the regeneration of the DPF filter and monitor its activation.

It's important to note that the Premium version does not guarantee greater compatibility than the Free version. So, the users interested in buying, have to check the proper connection of the Free version with cars.

The free version provides a range of functions and for less demanding users is a good on-board computer (OBC). The Premium version was created for more demanding users who want an advanced OBC.
The graphics of the Premium version has been optimized and improved both in aesthetic and features to make your driving experience even more enjoyable. Through the Head Up Display function (HUD) of the Live Data you will be able to read all the information in your field of view.

For more informations, read the Free version description.

The functions of both two apps are absolutely equivalent, except for those with limitations in Free version (listed below):
Do not allow to show and reset engine fault codes/DTC trouble codes stored;
- Keep only the last three trips and data;
- The average consumption and the other values are based on the last three trips available, with a poor precision;
- Show only the last two refuelings;
- Do not display the arrival position;
- Do not allow navigation to the last known position;
- Do not allow other user addition;
- During the trip, it allows only the display of acceleration 0-100 km/h;
- Display HUD function not supported in Free version.

If you purchase the Premium version you can overcome all of these limitations and you could enjoy a new generation of on-board computer.
summary: Measure torque and HP, Clear engine errors, View data in Google Maps!.

comments: After the update it stopped working and freezes up

I want my money back ASAP!!! Peeps crashing when I push the petrol tank icon. sometimes it starts and sometimes it doesn't after the crash. as well as not connecting back to that Bluetooth ODB. as well as I keep editing that ODO mileage does not correspond to what's actually on the car dashboard and what's in the app after driving. I am using P-30 and Android 9. Very disappointed that things crash on a paid version üòí map logger doesn't save!!!

I bought the premium version hoping to have possibility to export individual drive logs with all obd & GPS data. Instead, it simply generates avg speed. Is there an option to customize the excel export data? Apart from few niggles, the app is decent but still can't go fullscreen on my Samsung Note 8 I contacted customer service with above question and i get an "sorry, I don't understand what you are asking" as response... Although it wasn't much, i feel cheated with premium

IMHO the app is wonderful, but I do not trust it anymore since I bought the PREMIUM version. The previous (and free) PRO version give me different values from the payd one. Who lies? Moreover the PREMIUM version take a lot of time entering the settings page. Never had any answers by developer. Underclassed to 1 star: * no answers from developer * Pro version and Premium version show different values (for example HP) * fuel consumption values are inverted (km/l shows a value in l/100 and vicevers)

Very useful application reads most information of the vehicle but... On my dashboard tachometer max rpm 6000 but on live data of app 5000. Red zone on my car 5000 - 6000, on app 3000-5000. And could you add values in Euro?

title: Koch Morse Trainer Pro
description:
Due to changes to the law, please read our privacy policy before purchasing this app. 

Take your morse code to the next level with Koch Morse Trainer Pro. The only trainer that supports prosigns (procedural signals) and non-english extensions characters on Android.

Learn or improve your morse code in a short amount of time. The Koch method is designed to teach you morse at full speed. There's no need to learn at slow speeds then re-learn all the characters again once you increase your wpm.

If you wish to start off slow or simply want to pass your 5 wpm morse exam, this app has adjustable speeds to suit your needs.

KMT uses Farnsworth timings like the ARRL use for their transmissions and practice tapes. You can increase the gap between characters so you still learn them at full speed but not feel overwhelmed by the frequency they are sent.

Main Features:

‚úì Character and word speeds are fully adjustable between 5 and 50 wpm
‚úì Eight modes: random, 100 common words, 1000 common words, (German users can also select 100 and 1000 common German words), QSO (includes prosigns), callsign, morse abbreviations, custom text (which also allows you to input & practice prosigns also), and RSS Feeds
‚úì Test yourself! Input what you're hearing and calculate your results to see how well you're doing
‚úì Warm up feature which plays the latest character prior to the main session
‚úì Character setup option screen to include/exclude characters, such as punctuation, prosigns and non-english characters - this also allows you to learn additional characters
‚úì Adjustable group size with option to fix size in random mode
‚úì Adjustable pre-session delay and session time (1 minute to 30 minutes)
‚úì Adjustable tone frequency (200Hz - 2000Hz)
‚úì Background noise (QRM) simulator
‚úì Speak feature which tells you the latest character if text to speech is available
‚úì Favour recent characters option for those new characters so they are played more often
‚úì Display character before or after it's sent
‚úì Plus lots of customisable options to change

comments: This is a very comprehensive trainer, one I will enjoy using. My only issue is that the RSS feed output starts jumping from the top of the screen down to the bottom, then back up again between each word, once the text reaches the bottom of the window and has to start scrolling the visible window. This is stomach churning if you're trying to read while listening to the code. Otherwise, this is a really good tutor.

App is great, however it stays in idle mode after closing and drains my battery. Have not found a way to get the app out of idle mode so it closes and does not drain my battery. Will rate higher once this is fixed.

Excellent so far! Ive been looking for a way to learn morse for fifty years. i discovered the Koch method which seemed made for smartphones. Within a very short space of time of installing KMT Pro i found i was "seeing" letters in my head from the sound without trying to decode the dots and dashes. A way to go yet but very impressed so far.

works real well on my samsung tablet with a pair of headphones. Sound quality is ok it doesnt seem to be distorted. Sometimes when I miss a character it gives me credit for a correct answer. Not sure whats up there. It takes a lot of practice to learn the code, but this seeems to help.

The best morse trainer I came across. The keyboard input is extremely useful when "on the go" and no writing pad at hand. The statistics and the ability to practice with RSS feeds make this the perfect app for me.

title: Mobile HotSpot Pro
description:
Mobile HotSpot is an application which facilitates your Internet phone connection sharing either with your tablet or PC via a Wi-Fi connection (tethering).

You can easily share your Internet mobile with only ONE CLICK.

Mobile HotSpot shows the number of devices connected to your hotspot. It is also possible to see in detail the list of all connected devices.

You can define a timer to turn off your HotSpot automatically after a number of minutes.


Also you can automatically activate your HotSpot as you connect your phone on AC or USB power. In the same way, as you disconnect your phone from a power source you can automatically turn off the HotSpot application.


Finally, in order to save your battery "Mobile HotSpot" turns itself off and instantly stops sharing when your battery is running at less than 20%.


Most parameters can be changed via a configuration screen available via the menu: SSID, timer, battery level, notification.


Mobile HotSpot is the most complete application on Google Play to manage tethering and share your Internet connection from your phone.

It is compatible with Desktop, Laptop, iPad, Playstation 3 (PS3), Xbox, Blueray, Smart TV.

Warning, some providers block the Internet connection sharing or tethering (Ex: Sprint). This application works only if tethering is running on your phone.


If Mobile HotSpot is not compatible with your device, please don‚Äôt rate it negatively. Instead send me an email describing your problem, your model device and I will be pleased to implement corrections and publish an updated version.

Thank you in advance for your cooperation.



If you need help to solve a problem, you can visit the Mobile HotSpot support or FAQ Web pages :

Support : http://androidstt.com/mobilehotspot/support/
FAQ: http://androidstt.com/mobilehotspot/faq/


** Your carrier may charge you for hotspot, validate your agreement your provider.

title: eCar PRO (OBD2 Car Diagnostic)
description:
Transform your android mobile device into a car diagnostic scan tool using eCAR PRO and the aid of a low-cost Bluetooth OBD2 adapter. Read & clear engine fault codes and view a multitude of engine sensors in real time for OBDII compliant cars (in US: model yrs 1996 & up). Gain access to your vehicle's ECU and monitor emission systems, engine performance, & catalytic converters. View comparisons on O2 sensors & fuel trim banks; Set/View alarms: speed (user adjustable), coolant temperature, battery, fuel, & rpm. Read quarter (¬º) mile & 0-60 mph Timers, Fuel Economy, CO2 Analysis, VIN, Torque, Horsepower & More!

An OBD Bluetooth adapter that connects to your car‚Äôs engine management OBD port is required. Common adapters include BAFX, ELM327, OBDLink LX, Kiwi, & VGate and can be purchased on websites such as eBay or Amazon (http://www.amazon.com/BAFX-Products-Bluetooth-diagnostics-Android/dp/B005NLQAHS). eCAR connects to secure & insecure adapters.

eCAR PRO is a powerful OBDII scanner designed by a team of programmers, graphic designers, and top car mechanics. eCAR‚Äôs UI is comprehensive, intuitive and designed for ease-of-use for car enthusiasts and the DIY car repair mechanic. Additional details:
 
DTC (Diagnostic Trouble Codes): Check & clear Check Engine Light (CEL). View confirmed, pending, and historic DTC. Continuous monitoring available for viewing engine fault codes as they appear in real time. Already have a DTC from another code reader? Then use the built in DTC SES Library to retrievedescriptions & HUM.

Emission Readiness (Mode 6): There are up to 11 monitors that check the emission system on gasoline engines; 9 on compression (Diesel) engines. Informs the user if the vehicle is unlikely to pass emission tests. Displays additional info stored in vehicle‚Äôs ECU, eg. mode, time/distance MIL on, etc.

Gauges & Alarms: Contains several car gauges with preset alarms. User adjustable speedometer alarm available with On/Off alarm sound.

Vehicle Sensors: Engine sensor data is displayed in real-time in Gauge, Graph, and Text formats. Enhanced gauges specific to each sensor are provided. Relevant sensor parameters are shown on each gauge including Min & Max values. Includes adjustable graph time axis.

Temperature Sensors: View readings for all available temperature sensors. In addition to coolant temperature; air intake, catalyst (catalytic converters), ambient air, and oil temperatures can be viewed. Temperature alarm for coolant overheat is available.

Oxygen Sensors: View real-time O2 sensor values and monitor the health of the vehicle‚Äôs catalytic converters. Performs a comparison of O2 sensors.

Fuel Trim: Some of the most common fault codes are related to fuel trim. View comparisons of Short & Long term data for each Bank in real time.

Fuel Economy: Monitor instant MPG, average fuel economy, & fuel level.  A CO2 gauge is provided to assist in monitoring the amount of CO2 the vehicle releases. This activity has been credited with assisting drivers improve their driving habits while reducing fuel consumption.

Timers: eCAR features a trip timer, 0-60 mph & ¬º mile race timers; for the metric users among us, 0-100 kmh and 400 meter timers are available. Includes Countdown & Auto Speed Detect. The Timer & method of execution provide the most accurate speed timer for OBD applications on the market today!

Torque & Horsepower: Don‚Äôt have your own torque dyno/dynamo-meter? Don‚Äôt worry! eCAR mobile app can calculate live data for Horsepower & Torque.

More: Includes options for units, color scheme, & graph speed. eCAR can read 100+ vehicle sensors and doesn't require software plug-ins. Tested on Audi, BMW, Buick, Chevy, Chrysler, Dodge, Fiat, Ford, GM, Honda, Hyundai, Jaguar, KIA, Mercedes, Mazda, Mitsubishi, Nissan, Opel, Pontiac, Renault, Seat, Subaru, Suzuki, Toyota, Volkswagen, VW, ...

Please note that available sensors vary by vehicle make & model.

comments: This app has a fair amount of customization options, the app seems to perform mostly well. With that being said there's definitely some bugs. Any of my friends who have an iPhone it seems, this app doesn't play nicely with their contacts. Their phone number simply shows up as "#" inside this app, when other messages applications recognizes them. Also, the tutorial doesn't seem to be formatted for larger screen devices correctly while the rest of the app seems to format correctly.
Excellent texting app. Quick, easy to use, and the developer is always quick to respond to any issue that comes up (if one even does). Highly recommended.
Great app. Love the customization and the developer is very responsive to any emails I send with questions about his app. Continues to update so well worth the cost. Great Job!

The 5* review the app deserved! There are a couple features it could use (that admittedly other apps don't have, either), but it's still one of the best texting apps I've used! Only issue is not *all* links preview in the message window, specifically image links like ones from imgur :(.

I downloaded this app recently and it's a better alternative to Android Messages. It has more customization options, including some that Google has removed from Android Messages as well as a dark mode and other goodies. Check it out!

title: Lightning Browser Plus - Web Browser
description:
Lightning Browser Plus is a simple, fast web browser that focuses on design, security, and efficiency. It uses material design, doesn't track you, give you lots of options to protect your privacy. It gets out of the way of the user. I built this browser because I wanted something better.

What this contains over the free version:
‚óè Unlimited open tabs
‚óè Custom ad blocking source controls, choose from default hosts file, local hosts file, or remote hosts file

‚óè Ad blocking - Blocking ads is a core feature of Lightning Browser, meant to improve the speed and security of your browsing experience.

‚óè Design - Lightning's interface was carefully crafted so you can browse as efficiently as possible. Tabs and Bookmarks are all tucked neatly away in side drawers, only a swipe away, allowing maximum screen viewing with minimal interference from the browser's chrome. Dark Mode, Light Mode, Color Mode, Night Mode... Anyway, whatever you like, there's a mode for you.

‚óè Speed - By utilizing the WebKit rendering engine that comes built into your Android device, Lightning can ensure a swift, lightweight experience.

‚óè Privacy - Use Incognito Mode to browse without leaving a footprint, download Orbot and turn on TOR proxy support to mask your identify and location, use StartPage or DuckDuckGo for your search engine, or disable settings that you think leave you at risk. Whatever your concern, Lightning will try to help.

‚óè Features - Full-screen, check. AdBlock, check. Inverted Rendering, check. All the search engines you want, check. Search Suggestions, Bookmarks, History, User Agents, Reading Mode, whatever you need, Lightning does it.

‚óè Open-source - Just as Android open-source, so is Lightning. I believe that the best software is built when communities come together to engineer the best solution. Head over to the repository on GitHub to contribute or translate.

Permissions
‚óè permission.INTERNET: Needed to access the internet for browsing
‚óè permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: Needed for downloading files and backing up data
‚óè permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: Needed for downloading files and restoring data
‚óè permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION: Needed for sites that want your location (you can deny location access)
‚óèpermission.RECORD_AUDIO: Utilized by WebRTC, turned off by default
‚óèpermission.CAMERA: Utilized by WebRTC, turned off by default

Talk to me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/RestainoAnthony

Fork me on GitHub: https://github.com/anthonycr/Lightning-Browser
descriptionHTML:
Lightning Browser Plus is a simple, fast web browser that focuses on design, security, and efficiency. It uses material design, doesn't track you, give you lots of options to protect your privacy. It gets out of the way of the user. I built this browser because I wanted something better.

What this contains over the free version:
‚óè Unlimited open tabs
‚óè Custom ad blocking source controls, choose from default hosts file, local hosts file, or remote hosts file

‚óè Ad blocking - Blocking ads is a core feature of Lightning Browser, meant to improve the speed and security of your browsing experience.

‚óè Design - Lightning's interface was carefully crafted so you can browse as efficiently as possible. Tabs and Bookmarks are all tucked neatly away in side drawers, only a swipe away, allowing maximum screen viewing with minimal interference from the browser's chrome. Dark Mode, Light Mode, Color Mode, Night Mode... Anyway, whatever you like, there's a mode for you.

‚óè Speed - By utilizing the WebKit rendering engine that comes built into your Android device, Lightning can ensure a swift, lightweight experience.

‚óè Privacy - Use Incognito Mode to browse without leaving a footprint, download Orbot and turn on TOR proxy support to mask your identify and location, use StartPage or DuckDuckGo for your search engine, or disable settings that you think leave you at risk. Whatever your concern, Lightning will try to help.

‚óè Features - Full-screen, check. AdBlock, check. Inverted Rendering, check. All the search engines you want, check. Search Suggestions, Bookmarks, History, User Agents, Reading Mode, whatever you need, Lightning does it.

‚óè Open-source - Just as Android open-source, so is Lightning. I believe that the best software is built when communities come together to engineer the best solution. Head over to the repository on GitHub to contribute or translate.

Permissions
‚óè permission.INTERNET: Needed to access the internet for browsing
‚óè permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: Needed for downloading files and backing up data
‚óè permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: Needed for downloading files and restoring data
‚óè permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION: Needed for sites that want your location (you can deny location access)
‚óèpermission.RECORD_AUDIO: Utilized by WebRTC, turned off by default
‚óèpermission.CAMERA: Utilized by WebRTC, turned off by default

Talk to me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/RestainoAnthony

Fork me on GitHub: https://github.com/anthonycr/Lightning-Browser
summary: Speed, Simplicity, Security - Lightning makes browsing the web better.

Love this thing. I purchased the Pro version a long ways back, and it has been fun to watch Lightning grow and mature. I highly recommend this browser.
Sometime simplicity is often the hardest thing to accomplish. So by keeping this browser so clean and simple, you have done a good job.
Thanks for the build update, glad this awesome browser wasn't abandoned

title: Klink - Tether without root
description:
Tether your Android phone to your PC over USB WITHOUT rooting!  Klink only needs a data plan and works without a tethering option.

NOTE: Please try the free demo version ("Klink Demo" on the market) to test compatibility before buying.  The demo can be replaced with the paid version via the market without any further setup on your computer.

FEATURES:

- Does NOT require rooting

- One-time purchase fee -- upgrades are free via the Market.

- Uses USB for longer battery life and greater speed

- Supports Windows (XP/Vista/7/32-bit/64-bit), Mac OS X 10.5 (or later), and Ubuntu/Linux (32-bit and 64-bit)

- Written in C (NOT Java) for efficiency, speed, and lower power consumption.
  * Handles hundreds of simultaneous connections.  Klink can take on the most demanding applications.
  * Is fast and capable of handling 4g speeds: can reach 30mbps in real-world conditions on capable phones.

- Can transparently rewrite "User-Agent" headers so that your PC browser will look like a mobile device when browsing web pages. This can save bandwidth by conveniently defaulting to the mobile version of websites.

- Designed so that network traffic effectively originates from the phone.  This differs from rooted devices, which forward packets directly from the PC.

USAGE:

After installing and running Klink, please tap "Set up your Computer" and follow the instructions.  Klink requires the installation of a small companion program on your PC in order to tether without rooting, so following the step-by-step guide is suggested.  The same documentation is also available on our website, in case you would like to follow along on a big screen while at home.

Special note to PdaNet or EasyTether users:
 * Klink is comparable in nature to these programs and configuration should be similar.

Keep in mind that Klink's consumption of data depends on usage.

HELP: Please visit the Google Group via http://www.faveset.com/klink/support,
or email klink@faveset.com.

Please leave your email in the comments if you have any questions, so that someone can get in touch with you.  It would be appreciated if you asked for help before posting negative feedback as Klink has been used successfully with thousands of phone and PC configurations.

As some users may have difficulty evaluating everything within the 15-minute refund window, a once-per-user 24-hour return policy is in effect; simply include your order email or number when contacting support.  No one should feel rushed.  Please contact support if you need any help during setup.

If you're experiencing slow speeds, it's likely due to your phone's connection.  Klink can match the 8-9mbps speeds reported by the speedtest app over a 4g connection.  It is recommended that you compare speeds with the speedtest app on the market.

ABOUT:

Are there moments when you feel like using your computer but cannot find an Internet connection? Perhaps you need to type a long email on the go despite loathing the idea of pecking around on a touchscreen. Or maybe you prefer to easily browse and chat while sending that email on a comfortably sized screen. Whatever your use case, if you have an Android phone with Internet access and want to bring your computer online, Klink is for you!

Klink allows you to share your Android device's Internet connection with your PC. With it, you can run your favorite browser, most chat applications, many games (TCP/IP and UDP support), and more, all using your phone's existing data plan without an additional tethering option.  (NOTE: Data and plan limits still apply, so please check the terms of your plan before using Klink.)

comments: The best 5 dollars I have purchased! Thanks alot! UPDATE 5/15/2019 Unfortunatly I have to turn this to a 1 star. I can no longer use this app because, The app cannot verify the license for some reason EVEN though I legally purchased the app. It always shows this "License Failure Message" I did everything as instructed to do but, with no luck. Until there is a change, I cannot recommend this app to anyone.
Works as described for my Debian OS with Nexus 6 Nougat... Used easytether in past but stopped working with Nougat update. This solves problem... Gig'em

This app works like a charm on the OnePlus 3. Had some problems getting it set up but after googling the error code (14) I found the fix (there was a newer Mac version not linked in the app)... Also discovered that the dev seems really helpful. Other positives : Written in C for efficiency and supports 4g very well. Thanks to the dev!

I've had this app for almost a year and   it's been working perfectly. My LG G2 just recently updated to Lollipop 5.0.2 and it stopped working. I emailed the developers with my issues and they responded within the same day. Excellent customer service! I got it back to work just fine. If you run into any problems, let them know immediately and they will help you fix it.

I loved this app but it recently stopped working with my HTC one m8 after it automatically installed a system update. I had to get a new phone through my warranty (for other reasons) and was elated that Klink was working again. However, the new m8 automatically updated its system and Klink doesn't work again. Any suggestions?

title: Mocha TN5250
description:
Mocha TN5250 for Android provides TN5250 emulation for AS/400 terminal access.

Try the free LITE version before making an order. 

- Supports all standard 5250 emulation features
- Support Tablet size devices.
- Alternate screen size (24x80 or 27x132) 
- SSL (Secure Socket Layer). Uses SSL included with the Android OS.
- Auto login
- Can handle 20 different AS/400 configurations
- F1-F24 keys + a set of special keys such as SYSREQ
- Support for 9 different EBCDIC code pages
- Colors can be customized
- Device name support 
- 2 finger zoom
- Support for Barcode scanner from ZXing (camera scanner)
- Help system

comments: Works well
Switched to the Android version after using it on iPad for a while. This version has no Macro functionality, which really slows down my workflow. Any plans to put Macros in?
Only supports one session at a time! Useless to me. I want a refund.
Has no esc key. Useless to me.

This app used to be worthy of five stars until they removed the ability to map navigation keys like previous/next field to hardware keys. Now the volume rocker defaults to page up/down with no way to change it. Too bad they took away a good feature for voice input support (who would use this in a terminal emulator?) and the ability to change  the text and background colors. I'm giving an extra star because the developer was very responsive to my concerns. I'm uninstalling and trying Glink.

title: Unread Badge PRO (for Gmail)
description:
What is it?
‚Ä¢ A widget that shows the number of unread emails 
‚Ä¢ With one click, it directly opens the Gmail app with a specific account/folder/label
‚Ä¢ One icon can have one-click links to different accounts/folders/labels

Who needs it?
‚Ä¢ People who often check email
‚Ä¢ People who have multiple Gmail accounts and don't want to launch Gmail app -> Swipe left for menu -> Select account -> select label (Only one-click is required with Unread Badge. Yes, one-click)
‚Ä¢ People who wants to customize the Gmail icon

What does it do?
‚Ä¢ You can use multiple Gmail accounts 
‚Ä¢ You can select different labels/tabs/folders (*paid version only)
‚Ä¢ One widget can support multiple accounts and labels

Following permissions are needed:
‚Ä¢ GET_ACCOUNTS: To read available email accounts
‚Ä¢ READ_CONTENT_PROVIDER: To read unread email counts
‚Ä¢ Notification Listener Service: To be notified when a new email is received

* The Exchange Accounts (IMAP accounts) are not supported. It is technically not possible to support it at the moment. We will support it as soon as it is possible. Thank you for your patience.


FAQ & Credit:
http://www.ellevsoft.com/products/gmail-unread-counter

comments: Well done. The current gmail app by google doesn't do a good job of displaying the number of unread messages in gmail like on the iPhone. This widget takes care of that beautifully. And it is always up to date.

Great App. Very helpful for my important work email alerts. Draw back is the alerymt halts my steaming and shuts down my music in the car on Android Auto until I acknowledge it basically having to pickup my phone while driving risking a move g violation ticket.
Does exactly what it's supposed to do and works around sporadic (or non existent) notifications by the Gmail app. Easy to use and the icon customization is a nice touch.
EXACTLY WHAT I'VE BEEN LOOKING FOR! Before this, I was using dashclock which did a well enough job. But this app does the same and more in a more compact format.

You need to watch the attached video to figure out how to adjust the Font and ICON size. They ARE easily adjustable, however you need really good hand/eye coordination to get the size slider to the exact spot you want. It took me a couple of days to realize that the preview in the install section actually applies in real time to the badge you have chosen. It works great, so BRAVO to the developer for option. Hopefully others will figure this out quicker (and easier) than I did.  :-)

title: Hello Kitty Stickers - WAStickerApps for WhatsApp
description:
Hello Kitty Stickers - WAStickerApps is the perfect stickerpack for WhatsApp for all the Hello Kitty lovers in the world. Its supercute stickers will help you express your emotions to friends and family. It features:

‚úîÔ∏èMore than 100 Hello Kitty stickers,
‚úîÔ∏èStickers of high quality,
‚úîÔ∏èSpecially designed for girls phones,
‚úîÔ∏èNo bloatware, no ads, just super fabulous high quality stickers for your phone.

Hello Kitty is here to make your conversations more cute, more fabulous, more charming and prettier than ever! With your help it will spread love and joy worldwide! 


How to add stickers to WhatsApp (WAStickerApps)?
1. Tap the "+" icon next to the sticker category you'd like to add and confirm.
2. Open WhatsApp, tap the smiley icon in the bottom left corner and then tap the sticker icon in the bottom. Your sticker category will appear in the panel (after the clock and star icons). Its super simple!

How to remove stickers from WhatsApp (WAStickerApps)?
1. Open WhatsApp, tap the smiley icon in the bottom left corner and then tap the sticker icon in the bottom. 
2. Tap the "+" icon shown to the right from all sticker tabs.
3. Tap "My stickers" tab on top and remove any category using the trash icon. If deleted by mistake, you can always add that category again from Hello Kitty Stickers - WAStickerApps app. 

My sticker categories sometimes disappear in WhatsApp (WAStickerApps). Why? And how to fix it?
Your device manufacturer might be trying to optimise the battery life, and some unexpected things can happen such as disappearing stickers from the apps which haven't been opened recently. Please try this solution: go into your device Settings / Battery / "Hello Kitty Stickers - WAStickerApps" and select "Don't optimise" (you may need to search for a similar wording as it varies on different devices).


At The Themes World we aim to deliver the best themes, stickers, icons and more directly to your smartphone. If you have any questions, or want to support us with ideas to improve our products, feel free to contact us anytime. If you enjoy our emoji collection, please send more of our stickers around! Thank you :)

title: HKC SecureComm
description:
The HKC App, will allow end users to remotely control their security system.  The App offers easy set & unset commands, push notification (with audible annunciation), fully functional keypad, log interrogation and, depending on your system control panel, output switching.

Note: In order to use this App you must have a HKC alarm system that is setup with an account with the HKC SecureComm cloud service.
descriptionHTML:
The HKC App, will allow end users to remotely control their security system. The App offers easy set & unset commands, push notification (with audible annunciation), fully functional keypad, log interrogation and, depending on your system control panel, output switching.

Note: In order to use this App you must have a HKC alarm system that is setup with an account with the HKC SecureComm cloud service.
summary: Remote control and management of HKC security systems

comments: The app itself is quite good. Unfortunately the issues are there are regular server issues & network issues & customers are supposed to auto 'hop' to a backup network but this doesn't happen always. If they manually move you, instant fix. My installer has rang them many times & the issue is the same and we have fantastic coverage where we live. But it's at their side, the issue is. I like the app & just wish the service was as reliable & that the service telecoms elements worked as they should.

This app does what it supposed to do but it's extremely slow and very old fashioned. The UI of this app reminds me of C, C++ days. It's not a big effort to develop a new UI, customers are paying for this app, please do something to improve user experience.

Great app have it over 4 years now and never had any problems, but would like to know how to update app as seen someone elses app and it's more modern. But good all so far. Great to have access to alarm system if away so one can turn alarm off if need be, without annoying the neighbour's if there is a fault.

Brilliant app, but it needs an urgent update!! It worked perfectly on my Samsung S7, but on Samsung S10, it doesn't notify me anymore of alarms. Which makes an Alarm app a little useless, to put it mildly. I am sure that the problem is with the new version of Android, but someone has to bring the app up to speed again!! ASAP, please!

I have just upgraded to the hyawie P30 Pro and the app is not working at all . It works fine on my iPad and my old Samsung A6 and HTC and my wife's Samsung S8 , from other negative reviews it appears I am not on my own. When is the update to the App due???

title: Conference Call Dialer Pro
description:
Quick and easy way to join conference calls (aka ATC, Audio Tele Conferencing) with a single touch of your screen. 

Conference Call Dialer Pro is created for people who join multiple conference calls (sometimes called conf calls) in a day, especially while traveling (like driving a car, walking, jogging, etc) or working away from your computer. It reads data from your Android calendar and dials the proper gateway number providing also the conference code (aka participant access code), so that you don't need to memorize all the conference details. Conference calling has never being easier!

Additionally there is a widget available that makes Conference Call Dialer Pro even easier to use directly from your home screen.

Thanks to Conference Call Dialer Pro you will never again need to write down the  participant code or search for the invitation in your email client. Everything is available right away at your finger tips. No need to create any external account (like with some other applications), it simply works right after downloading to your smartphone!

Main functionality:
- Retrieve information about meetings from your calendar (outlook, gmail, etc) - you choose which one you want to use. Standard Android Calendar API is used for this capability.
- Dial into conference calls with conf code/participant code from the invitation - allows for selection if more than one conference code is found
- Manage and use multiple dial-in numbers/audio bridges (e.g. of your company and of your customers)
- View the details of each invitation
- A widget for the home screen for convenient "My conference call" and "Join current meeting" actions
- Quickly join your own conference call from every screen
- Automatic import of bridge numbers for selected companies
- Easy management of prefixes used to identify conference codes/participant codes in the invitation
- Handling of leader pins, direct phone numbers (must start with +)
- New smaller widget for the home screen
- Handling of # and blackberry style of phone numbers, so +PHONENUM#CONFCODE#LEADERPIN and +PHONENUMxCONFCODExLEADERPIN
- Notifications
- Default gateway per conference code

For more details about how CCD discovers information, please see FAQ at https://sites.google.com/site/conferencecalldialerhomepage/home

IMPORTANT - if your device has a "privacy guard" functionality included (e.g. CM 10.1 builds), don't forget to white-list Conf Call Dialer Pro. Otherwise you'll see no calendars on the calendar selection list.

Before you buy the Pro version, test your phone and your calendar and dialer application with the Free version. Some smartphones (like from Sony or OnePlus) seem not to expose proper API for placing conference calls.

The release cycle for the Pro version is by design not in sync with the Free version. In most cases features from the Free version get migrated to the Pro version approximately 2-4 weeks later to ensure optimal stability of the Pro version.

Quick and easy way to join conference calls (aka ATC, Audio Tele Conferencing) with a single touch of your screen.

Conference Call Dialer Pro is created for people who join multiple conference calls (sometimes called conf calls) in a day, especially while traveling (like driving a car, walking, jogging, etc) or working away from your computer. Conference calling has never being easier!

Additionally there is a widget available that makes Conference Call Dialer Pro even easier to use directly from your home screen.

Everything is available right away at your finger tips. No need to create any external account (like with some other applications), it simply works right after downloading to your smartphone!

Main functionality:
- Retrieve information about meetings from your calendar (outlook, gmail, etc) - you choose which one you want to use. Standard Android Calendar API is used for this capability.
- Dial into conference calls with conf code/participant code from the invitation - allows for selection if more than one conference code is found

- A widget for the home screen for convenient "My conference call" and "Join current meeting" actions

title: MailCal for Exchange
description:
Exchange & Outlook email and calendar client that uses EWS/OWA/Webmail protocol to sync emails and events. Modern looking, and uses webmail (ews) access to connect, thus being a perfect solution if you want to access company mail on personal devices without submitting the device to company restrictions. 

This app acts as a PULL client (over EWS) instead of PUSH client (ActiveSync) and therefore can allow users to access corporate email without making company IT take over as Device Admins (as long as your company allows webmail/ews access). 


Notable Features include: 
------------------------------------

- Syncs Emails and Calendars, and provides Contacts integration 
- Syncs calendar entries with DEVICE CALENDAR 
- Sync frequency configurable for busy/peak and non-peak periods
- Provides an Address book with automatic saving of information from recent contacts in Mailbox
- Search Contacts on Company / Exchange directory
- Support Email folders other than Inbox as well
- Support for Downloading and Uploading Attachments 
- Support for loading inline images in emails
- Configurable notification settings
- Material Design based user friendly interface
- Exchange / Outlook Client
- Battery Friendly

Credits: 
------------
- App icons by http://somerandomdude.com/work/iconic/ (P.J. Onori) and http://www.icons4android.com/

comments: It took me long research to reach this app. It is perfect. It syncs email and agenda on exchange via ews, so, if you have owa, you have MailCal. Just go for it. And it is FAST

Best app I've used for email by far! The company I work for was forcing us to use Company Portal/Outlook/etc.. while forcing us to allow them administrative rights on our personal mobile phone. With MailCal I no longer need the additional bloat wear or big brother looking over me. Another plus is my work calendar syncs with my Google calendar, I know have 1 place to look for meetings/events.   Great job, thank you!

Good app. I use it to get work's mail and calendar without need to make the workplace admin of phone. issues: 1. app keeps sync in background even when i set not to. 2. search is not very good. 3. calendar does not sync.
I am using this app since 2016. But now Microsoft supports 2 factor authentication. 2nd factor being a SMS sent to phone. There is no provision in this app to handle it. So, it's useless now.

Been great so far the last month or so ive had it. It looks basic but is very funtional. Does everything i need it to. No other apps would allow me to login to this specific owa so it's a god send. Just hope it doesnt end up prevented somehow.
